title: (Bug) Changing audio devices while in the league client causes the client to lose sound
body:
I have headphones going into an audioengine dac, and when I turn the dac off and switch to speakers, or vice versa, the client loses all sound unless you restart the client.

How to duplicate this bug:
-turn off dac
-unplug headphones and plug in speakers ( or vice versa)
-turn on  dac and the client will have no sound
